channel.title: Forum of Lies 6 (The Unseen, The fool and The Alchemist has won)
channel.description:
**The game master/ Host for this game is the one and only, me @Bounty. And my two assistants/Co-Hosts will be the mother of this forum @Queen_Alfa and @FadeBlade**
Rules 1. Follow The Global Forum Rules 2. Respect the host and the players 3. if you havent't posted content in 36 hours, you'll be prodded for inactivity. if you don't respond to that prod in 16 hours, you will be force replaced 4. No private messaging others in the game about the game 5. Do not screenshot private host messages 6. Don't throw the game. this inculdes any form of intent to make you or your faction lose 7. Refrain from posting so many times in a row 8. you are allowed to leave the game but doing it will net you are temporary blacklist meaning you can't join fourm games for a while. futher leaving may net with a permanent blacklist 9. You should post at least 3 posts each day 10. lets all have fun and play together!
Gameplay • Days last 96 hours, or until majority is reached for execution. Nights last 48 hours. • All actions, including whispers (Only Butler, Invoker(if they choose so), and Servant can whisper via loud whisper), must be sent to the mod. • Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server. • Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server. • All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the Class Cards Thread.
Executions • To accuse someone say "/accuse [player]" or "/vote [player]" • Votes saying Guilty or Not Guilty before the target is on the stand will not be counted. • Should the votes reach the majority, that player will go on trial. They can say a defense, and the rest of the players must vote Guilty or Not Guilty on the thread. • Players can discuss while the target is on trial. • No one is able to use day powers when a trial is in session. The Only exception is the king’s Decide Fate and the fortune teller's blasphemy!. • After the voting, the King has 24 hours to choose to allow or veto the vote. Should the king not respond, the majority vote will be accepted. • The day timer does not stop when the target is on trial. • If the day timer runs out before a total majority is hit, the option with the most votes is what happens to the target.
Picking a New King • When the king dies 24 hours is given for any player with royal blood to step up and take the throne. • After that 24 hours anyone is free to step up. • If only 1 person steps up when the day ends that person becomes the king • If 2 people step forward everyone votes on who should be the next king. Whoever has the most • votes during the end of the day becomes the king. If the votes are tied whoever stepped up 1st becomes the king
After The Night You will be told what happened to you
Night: You slept peacefully Someone occupied your night For whatever reason, you instead visited [x] Someone tried to occupy you but you had no time for them You were attacked but you survived You were unfortunately killed Your attempt to kill your target failed Your attempt to occupy your target failed Day: You were bewildered Your ability backfired (Pants on Fire/Dark Rune) You've been intimidated You were exposed to deadly nightshade! A mercenary has offered you a contract, do you accept? You've been slapped and cannot vote You've been threatened Journals Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
To Join To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
Players 1. DamaFaud 2. orangeandblack5 3. Moleland 4. PokemonKidRyan 5. deadfrien 6. Polikshadowbliss 7. Hippolytus 8. NozBugz 9. Ginerbreadgentleman 10. Sketch 11. Unkown 12. ThePlex
Back ups : 1.Chris mic
Graveyard: **Tardispaten - [color=steblue]The Observer[/color] - Died on Night 1** **Jammysplodge - [color=lightgrey]The Neutral King[/color] - Executed on Day 2** **Purpley Pete - [color=steblue]The Knight[/color] - Died on Night 2** **Frostwolf103 - [color=purple]The Assassin [/color] - Executed on Day 3** **Moleland - [color=steblue]The Knight[/color] -**Died on Night 3 **PokemonkidRyan** - [color=steblue]**The butler** [/color] - **Died on Night 3** **Deadfrein** - [color=orange]**The Demon** [/color] - **Mod killed on Night 3** **Hippolytus** - [color=pink]**The Fool** [/color] - **Executed on day 4** **Unknown - [color=steblue]The Prince [/color]Died on Night 4** **Sketch - [color=purple]The MasterMind[/color] - Died on Night 4** **Icibalus - [color=steblue]The Sheriff [/color]- Died on Night 4**
**Fol 6 events :** [The King and Class confirmation](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-the-game-has-started/1702/80?u=bounty) [Night 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-the-game-has-started/1702/239?u=bounty) [Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-2/1702/242?u=bounty) [@aniketos's Trial](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-2/1702/392?u=bounty) [Aniketos subs out](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-2/1702/427?u=bounty) [Jammysplodge's Trial](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-2/1702/786?u=bounty) [url=ttps://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-2/1702/1076]Night 2[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-2/1702/1087]Day 3[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-2/1702/1096?u=queen_alfa]King Election[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-3/1702/1528?u=queen_alfa]King Noz's crowning[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-3/1702/1640?u=queen_alfa]Frostwolf's Trial[/url] [url=https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-3/1702/1765?u=queen_alfa]FrostWolf's Execution & Day ending[/url] [Day 4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-4/1702/1768?u=bounty) [Hippolytus's trail](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-4/1702/1805?u=bounty) [Hippolytus's Execution & Day ending](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-4/1702/1937?u=bounty) [Day 5](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-5/1702/1940?u=bounty) [Night 6](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-day-5/1702/1980?u=bounty) [Day 7 and the end of the game](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-6-the-unseen-the-fool-and-the-alchemist-has-won/1702/1983?u=bounty)

item.title: Forum of Lies 6 (The Unseen, The fool and The Alchemist has won)
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
Oh shoot I totally forgot my own paper plate awards

MVP definitely goes to @Hippolytus, generally good Fool play (other than softing Fool, wtf lol)

Dirty Bastard Award goes to @Sketch . I became very suspicious of his claim even before Mole essentially proved him evil, but that was a low play to get himself towncred. If anybody does this again, they should certainly be punished - but honestly I find myself respecting his balls.

Worst Assassin goes to @Frostwolf103 . Stop poisoning me, meanie. ;(

Read full topic

item.title: Forum of Lies 6 (The Unseen, The fool and The Alchemist has won)
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
orangeandblack5:

1: There is literally only one BD killing role

Let’s not get hyperbolic here. You have the Prince and Knight to kill Fools.

I personally enjoy the gameplay of Jester as you have to skirt the line between not appearing too important while also maintaining a decent scuminess level. The Jester/Fool has a lot of fun with it. I agree the current penalty is too harsh for BD. It should at least be lowered to one day, but it should punish scum somehow as well. I liked ToS’s Jester.

Read full topic
item.source: Forum of Lies 6 (The Unseen, The fool and The Alchemist has won)

item.title: Forum of Lies 6 (The Unseen, The fool and The Alchemist has won)

item.description:
The last time BD faced buffed evils.

It was completely and utterly destroyed.

Or have you forgotten how thoroughly the Cult owned the BD that one time?

(Though if the Paladin hadn’t actually goofed, it might have been a different story.)

Read full topic
